name: Create First Secret via UI
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Create new project via **API**.

### Verify that:

- User can create first Secret after project created.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Create new project via API.

Verify that:
